name: Suno API
description: Suno API is an AI-powered music generation platform offering developers a scalable API to create studio-quality vocal and instrumental tracks from text prompts.
longDescription: Suno API is a service providing an API for AI-driven music generation, utilizing models like Suno, Riffusion, and Nuro to produce high-quality tracks efficiently. Its mission is to democratize music creation by making it fast, affordable, and accessible without requiring specialized skills or equipment. The platform addresses challenges in content creation by enabling text-based prompts to generate songs in diverse styles and languages, suitable for games, videos, and apps. It emphasizes commercial viability with no watermarks and licensed outputs, catering to developers and creators. Overall, Suno API empowers users to integrate music generation seamlessly into their workflows, fostering innovation in creative industries.
features: Vocal Music Generation: Allows users to create complete vocal tracks from text prompts, supporting various musical styles and languages for diverse applications.
Triple AI Models: Leverages Suno, Riffusion, and Nuro models to deliver high-quality and varied music outputs tailored to user needs.
No Watermark: Ensures generated songs are free of any branding, enabling immediate professional use without additional editing.
Commercial Use: Provides access to a premium pool for creating legally licensed music suitable for commercial projects.
Pay-As-You-Go Pricing: Offers flexible, cost-effective billing at $0.08 per generation, ideal for scalable usage.
Lightning Fast Generation: Produces studio-quality tracks in just 30 seconds, enhancing productivity for developers and creators.
24/7 Support: Includes access to a Discord community for real-time technical assistance and troubleshooting.
Extend Music: Enables seamless extension of existing tracks, allowing users to build upon generated content creatively.
Swap Sound: Permits sound swapping within music outputs to customize and refine audio elements efficiently.

faqs.question: What is Suno API?
faqs.answer: Suno API is an AI music generation service that provides an API for creating vocal and instrumental tracks from text prompts, powered by models like Suno, Riffusion, and Nuro.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Suno API offers a free plan that allows users to start generating music without requiring a credit card.

faqs.question: How much does music generation cost?
faqs.answer: The pricing is pay-as-you-go at $0.08 per generation, making it affordable for various usage levels.

faqs.question: Can I use the generated music commercially?
faqs.answer: Yes, through the premium subscription pool, you can create commercially licensed music that is legal and royalty-free.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a song?
faqs.answer: Songs are typically generated in about 30 seconds, thanks to optimized infrastructure.

faqs.question: What AI models does Suno API use?
faqs.answer: It utilizes three AI models: Suno, Riffusion, and Nuro, for diverse and high-quality music creation.

faqs.question: Is there API documentation available?
faqs.answer: Yes, detailed documentation can be found at https://docs.sunoapi.com, including endpoints and usage examples.

faqs.question: What languages are supported for vocal generation?
faqs.answer: Suno API supports various languages for vocal tracks, allowing for global and multilingual music creation.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Suno API into my application?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, the API is designed for developers to easily integrate music generation into apps, games, or other software.

faqs.question: What kind of support is offered?
faqs.answer: 24/7 support is available through a Discord community, providing one-on-one technical help.
